director.name: 克丽丝特尔·Z. 坎贝尔 Crystal Z Campbell

introduction: An archive of pareidolia, a condition in which someone sees a pattern or image of something that does not exist, is narrated by a descendant of exodusters.源自：https://www.chicagofilmfestival.com/film/revolver-short-film/------------A descendant of Exodusters—African Americans who founded settlements in the American Midwest in the late 19th century—recounts memories, dreams, and visions of her ancestor’s memories.源自：https://www.berlinale.de/en/2023/programme/202302310.html
